attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the prime minster to do this.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make an outside party make an in depth study into  climate change to prove once an for all if it is real or is the climatte going through 1 of its natural stages that it has went though before manys of time.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.  Please specify in thetitle of your petition what it is you would like the Prime Minister to do.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
